title: Floyd Mayweather Jr.: Donating "a sum of money" to Houston after the hurricane?
subtitle: A site showing, as claimed by the Houston Chronicle maywether, was giving assistance money to the victims of Hurricane Harvey, and a copy of Mani Bakyao appeared.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Floyd Maywether (or Manny Bakiao) donated a large amount of money to the relief efforts in Hurricane Harvey.
